A Perugia sono state arrestate più di 150 persone accusate di essere coinvolte nel traffico internazionale di droga

02 Nov 2019, 07:54

Il Comando provinciale dei Carabinieri di Perugia ha diffuso un comunicato per informare dell’arresto di oltre 150 persone sospettate di essere coinvolte nel traffico internazionale di droga. I Carabinieri hanno detto che durante l’operazione, compiuta a Perugia in collaborazione con organismi di polizia nazionali e internazionali, è stata sequestrata droga dal valore di decine di milioni di euro. Per il momento non ci sono altre informazioni: i dettagli dell’operazione verranno resi noti in una conferenza stampa con il procuratore della Repubblica reggente di Perugia, Giuseppe Petrazzini, in programma sabato mattina.

Mercury jumps up to 16 degrees today

02 Nov 2019, 07:08

Today will be mostly sunny with scattered high clouds. The wind will be south-southeast and light to moderate. It will warm. The maximum temperatures will be between 11 and 16 degrees.
It will be mostly sunny on the Black Sea. It will be light breeze to moderate southeast wind. The maximum air temperatures will be 14-16 degrees. The temperature of the sea water will be 18-19 degrees. The sea wave will be 2-3 points.
Over the mountains before noon, it will still remain mostly cloudy, over ridges and foggy. In some places there will still be light rain, over 1300 m - snow. After noon, the clouds will be broken and reduced to mostly sunny. It will be blowing to moderate breeze from west to southwest. The maximum temperature at a height of 1200 m will be about 7 degrees, at 2000 m - about 1 degree.
Temperature increases will continue on Sunday and Monday. The wind will be moderate, in eastern Bulgaria and in places north of the mountains and strong winds from south-southwest, where daytime temperatures will reach 25-27 degrees, in the other regions they will be between 15 and 20 degrees. Clouds will be broken, in places even to sunny.
More significant temporary increases in cloudiness will occur on Monday afternoon over southwestern areas and in places there and will prevail. The wind will change briefly with west-northwest.
